text:
Hello team, thank you for letting me in.
We have created a dev machine running Canton's Docker image. We were able to view the wallet GUI (localhost on port 80), but I'm having trouble allowing other users to view it through a secure channel. We're trying to access this dev server via an nginx instance that does SSL termination, but the GUI refuses to load. It asks for a login (administrator), but then there's a loading screen and an error. Any advice on how to configure your dev component so that external users can access it securely?
Another issue - how can we attach this docker to our dev wallet?  is it related to the "party_hint" argument?  I have ran the script with  -p "ef-wallet-1" -m "2" -w  args, yet your people have said they are not seeing us on your side. Please advise.

elements.text:

text: Hey there, just checking in from my side. Shared my egress IP address with Eric the other day for whitelisting, wondering if there's anything else we need to do to get that pushed forward?
